Headline- Diversity in Sports: Who do Our Children Have to Look up to?
ace_sentences: The percentage of players of color is much higher than the percentage of coaches of color.
I wonder why the MLB is much lower than the rest in terms of the percentage of players of color.
A majority of people watch sports.
The Super Bowl will happen soon.
It is important for kids to see a person of the same race as them.
It is important for kids to see that person doing great things.
It is important for kids to see that they can be more than other people tell them.
The headline is: Diversity in Sports: Who do our children have to look up to?
